p: The results were expressed as means and standard deviation. The data were compared by using a one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) test and post-hoc Bonferroni–Holm test. The correlation between the parameters of the same group was assessed by Pearson’s coefficient (r) according to the Colton scale. The level of significance was established at p ˂ 0.05. Multivariate analysis of the parameters was performed using PCA. The statistical analysis was performed using STATISTICA 12.0 software.
